Name: technical enablement
Description: As an APN Partner, you will have access to numerous technical training opportunities to support you in strengthening your AWS-based business. Resources include APN Partner-only technical content, APN Webcast technical videos, online technical Accreditations and Certifications, and discounts on AWS Instructor-Led training courses.

Name: business enablement
Description: As you advance through the tiers, you gain more business support from the APN. You become eligible for a number of different Funding Benefits, access to Partner Development Managers to help guide you through your journey, and gain the ability to apply to several APN Programs to help you differentiate your firm on AWS.

Name: sales
Description: There are a number of Sales and Marketing Opportunities you can take advantage of as a member of the APN. As you establish and mature your AWS practice, you have opportunities to participate in co-branded Marketing Campaigns, Joint Customer-Facing Webinars, Case Studies, Sponsorships, and more.

Name: sales enablement
Description: There are a number of Sales and Marketing Opportunities you can take advantage of as a member of the APN. As you establish and mature your AWS practice, you have opportunities to participate in co-branded Marketing Campaigns, Joint Customer-Facing Webinars, Case Studies, Sponsorships, and more.

Name: marketing enablement
Description: There are a number of Sales and Marketing Opportunities you can take advantage of as a member of the APN. As you establish and mature your AWS practice, you have opportunities to participate in co-branded Marketing Campaigns, Joint Customer-Facing Webinars, Case Studies, Sponsorships, and more.

Name: marketing
Description: There are a number of Sales and Marketing Opportunities you can take advantage of as a member of the APN. As you establish and mature your AWS practice, you have opportunities to participate in co-branded Marketing Campaigns, Joint Customer-Facing Webinars, Case Studies, Sponsorships, and more.

Name: consulting
Description: APN Consulting Partners are professional services firms that help customers design, architect, build, migrate, and manage their workloads and applications on AWS. Consulting Partners include System Integrators, Strategic Consultancies, Agencies, Managed Service Providers, and Value-Added Resellers.

Name: consulting partners
Description: APN Consulting Partners are professional services firms that help customers design, architect, build, migrate, and manage their workloads and applications on AWS. Consulting Partners include System Integrators, Strategic Consultancies, Agencies, Managed Service Providers, and Value-Added Resellers.

Name: technology
Description: APN Technology Partners provide software solutions that are either hosted on, or integrated with, the AWS platform. APN Technology Partners include Independent Software Vendors (ISVs), SaaS, PaaS, Developer Tools, Management and Security Vendors.

Name: technology partners
Description: APN Technology Partners provide software solutions that are either hosted on, or integrated with, the AWS platform. APN Technology Partners include Independent Software Vendors (ISVs), SaaS, PaaS, Developer Tools, Management and Security Vendors.

Name: success
Description: Are you beginning to build your business on AWS, or expanding your practice? Look to the APN to help you grow and succeed. The APN offers various programs and resources to support you in your journey. Whether you have a Consulting Practice or offer a Technology Solution on AWS, there are plenty of opportunities to advance your business.

Name: partner success
Description: Are you beginning to build your business on AWS, or expanding your practice? Look to the APN to help you grow and succeed. The APN offers various programs and resources to support you in your journey. Whether you have a Consulting Practice or offer a Technology Solution on AWS, there are plenty of opportunities to advance your business.

Name: success stories
Description: Are you beginning to build your business on AWS, or expanding your practice? Look to the APN to help you grow and succeed. The APN offers various programs and resources to support you in your journey. Whether you have a Consulting Practice or offer a Technology Solution on AWS, there are plenty of opportunities to advance your business.

Name: programs
Description: Partner Programs are designed to support the unique business models of APN members by providing them with increased prominence and additional support from AWS partner teams. In addition, partners can apply to attain APN Competencies based on their specialization in key AWS solution areas.

Name: slalom
Description: Slalom focuses on helping clients design, build, migrate, and manage their AWS deployments to reduce complexity and maximize value. Our expertise extends across next-generation infrastructure, custom development, advanced analytics, enterprise data management, and beyond. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Seattle, WA, Slalom has organically grown to over 4,500 employees. Slalom has the Big Data, Dev Ops, Mobile, and Migration AWS Competencies.

Name: competency
Description: AWS Competencies are granted to APN Partners who have demonstrated technical proficiency and proven customer success in specialized solution areas. Attaining an AWS Competency allows APN members to differentiate themselves to customers by showcasing expertise in a particular solution area.

Name: aws competency
Description: AWS Competencies are granted to APN Partners who have demonstrated technical proficiency and proven customer success in specialized solution areas. Attaining an AWS Competency allows APN members to differentiate themselves to customers by showcasing expertise in a particular solution area.

Name: solution provider program
Description: The AWS Solution Provider Program is designed for systems integrators, managed service providers, value-added resellers, and public sector partners to resell AWS Services to end customers as part of their differentiated solution. Under this program, Authorized Solution Providers manage, service, support, and bill Amazon Web Services (AWS) accounts for end customers.

Name: solution
Description: The AWS Solution Provider Program is designed for systems integrators, managed service providers, value-added resellers, and public sector partners to resell AWS Services to end customers as part of their differentiated solution. Under this program, Authorized Solution Providers manage, service, support, and bill Amazon Web Services (AWS) accounts for end customers.

Name: channel
Description: The AWS Global Channel Reseller Program enables qualified partners to resell AWS services to both commercial and public sector end customers. The program is designed for APN Consulting Partners who have built their AWS practice to include professional services and management of end customer AWS deployments.

Name: channel reseller
Description: The AWS Global Channel Reseller Program enables qualified partners to resell AWS services to both commercial and public sector end customers. The program is designed for APN Consulting Partners who have built their AWS practice to include professional services and management of end customer AWS deployments.

Name: channel resell
Description: The AWS Global Channel Reseller Program enables qualified partners to resell AWS services to both commercial and public sector end customers. The program is designed for APN Consulting Partners who have built their AWS practice to include professional services and management of end customer AWS deployments.

Name: training program
Description: The AWS Training Partner Program allows customers to easily identiify APN Partners that provide training which will enhance their knowledge of AWS.

Name: training
Description: The AWS Training Partner Program allows customers to easily identiify APN Partners that provide training which will enhance their knowledge of AWS.

Name: public sector
Description: The Public Sector Partner Program enables partners to accelerate their business growth on AWS through alignment with our public sector sales, marketing, partner, and bd teams. The program targets Standard and higher tier APN Consulting and Technology partners with a strong emphasis in public sector, including government, education, and non-profit.

Name: public sector program
Description: The Public Sector Partner Program enables partners to accelerate their business growth on AWS through alignment with our public sector sales, marketing, partner, and bd teams. The program targets Standard and higher tier APN Consulting and Technology partners with a strong emphasis in public sector, including government, education, and non-profit.

Name: marketplace consulting
Description: The AWS Marketplace Consulting Partner Program provides qualified AWS Partners with AWS training and marketing support to help them configure and deploy AWS Marketplace software for their customers.

Name: marketplace consulting program
Description: The AWS Marketplace Consulting Partner Program provides qualified AWS Partners with AWS training and marketing support to help them configure and deploy AWS Marketplace software for their customers.

Name: china program
Description: The AWS Global Channel Reseller Program enables qualified partners to resell AWS services to both commercial and public sector end customers. The program is designed for APN Consulting Partners who have built their AWS practice to include professional services and management of end customer AWS deployments.

Name: channel reseller program
Description: The AWS China Region Partner program provides high-valued marketing, technical, and business enablement tools to support APN partners at standard and advanced level who are registered in China as a legal entity, to serve the unique needs of customers in China on AWS China’s infrastructure.

Name: managed service provider program
Description: The AWS MSP Partner Program is designed for APN Consulting Partners who are skilled at cloud infrastructure and application migration, and deliver value to customers by offering proactive monitoring, automation, and management of their customer’s environment.

Name: msp
Description: The AWS MSP Partner Program is designed for APN Consulting Partners who are skilled at cloud infrastructure and application migration, and deliver value to customers by offering proactive monitoring, automation, and management of their customer’s environment.

Name: service delivery
Description: The AWS Service Delivery Program highlights APN Partners with a track record of delivering specific AWS services to customers. Attaining an AWS Service Delivery Distinction allows partners to differentiate themselves by showcasing to AWS customers areas of specialization.

Name: service delivery program
Description: The AWS Service Delivery Program highlights APN Partners with a track record of delivering specific AWS services to customers. Attaining an AWS Service Delivery Distinction allows partners to differentiate themselves by showcasing to AWS customers areas of specialization.

Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Seattle, WA, Slalom has organically grown to over 4,500 employees. Slalom has the Big Data, Dev Ops, Mobile, and Migration AWS Competencies.

Name: software as a service
Description: SaaS is a licensing and delivery model whereby software is centrally managed and hosted by a provider and available to customers on a subscription basis.Looking to grow your Software as a Service offering? Check out the SaaS on AWS Web page for further details.

Name: apn
Description: The AWS Partner Network (APN) is the global partner program for AWS. It is focused on helping APN Partners build successful AWS-based businesses or solutions by providing business, technical, marketing, and go-to-market support.

Name: mongo db
Description: Designed with a distributed systems approach, MongoDB is a non-relational database that stores data in flexible JSON-like documents that match the objects in your application code. It is strongly consistent by default and features a rich query language and support for secondary indexes. MongoDB offers a rich set of products including an as a service offering and a rich set of operational tools.

Name: mongodb
Description: Designed with a distributed systems approach, MongoDB is a non-relational database that stores data in flexible JSON-like documents that match the objects in your application code. It is strongly consistent by default and features a rich query language and support for secondary indexes. MongoDB offers a rich set of products including an as a service offering and a rich set of operational tools. Mongo DB has the AWS Big Data Competency.

Name: dynatrace
Description: Dynatrace has redefined how you monitor todays digital ecosystems. AI-powered, full stack & completely automated, it’s the only solution that provides answers, not just data, based on deep insight into every user, every transaction, across every application. More than 8,000 customers use Dynatrace to optimize customer experiences, innovate faster & modernize IT operations with absolute confidence. Dynatrace has the Dev Ops, and Migration AWS Competencies.

Name: dyna trace
Description: Dynatrace has redefined how you monitor todays digital ecosystems. Name: Become an APN Partner
Description: As an APN Partner, you will receive business, technical, sales, and marketing resources to help enable you to grow your business and better support your customers. Join the APN and take advantage of numerous APN Partner programs to differentiate your business and connect with customers on AWS. Learn more about the benefits of being an APN Partner below.

Name: Work with an APN Partner
Description: APN Partners are focused on your success, helping customers take full advantage of all the business benefits that AWS has to offer. With their deep expertise on AWS, APN Partners are uniquely positioned to help your company at any stage of your Cloud Adoption Journey and to help you achieve your business objectives. Find an APN Partner today.

Name: why should i become an apn partner
Description: As an APN Partner, you will receive business, technical, sales, and marketing resources to help enable you to grow your business and better support your customers. Join the APN and take advantage of numerous APN Partner programs to differentiate your business and connect with customers on AWS. Learn more about the benefits of being an APN Partner below.

Join the APN and take advantage of numerous APN Partner programs to differentiate your business and connect with customers on AWS. Learn more about the benefits of being an APN Partner below.

Name: why should i join apn
Description: As an APN Partner, you will receive business, technical, sales, and marketing resources to help enable you to grow your business and better support your customers. Join the APN and take advantage of numerous APN Partner programs to differentiate your business and connect with customers on AWS. Learn more about the benefits of being an APN Partner below.

Name: aws partner network
Description: The AWS Partner Network (APN) is the global partner program for AWS. It is focused on helping APN Partners build successful AWS-based businesses or solutions by providing business, technical, marketing, and go-to-market support.

Name: apn marketing central
Description: Access self-service marketing campaigns that allow you to quickly co-brand and launch solution-based campaigns or engage participating agencies for select marketing services with APN Marketing Central.

Name: apn sponsorships
Description: Sponsorship opportunities allow you to educate, entertain and engage with the best and the brightest developers and IT decision makers, hottest start-ups, and visionary technology leaders from a wide range of industries.

Name: reseller
Description: Increase your knowledge in AWS operations, billing and marketing to successfully grow your AWS Reseller business.

Name: aws competencies
Description: Demonstrate technical proficiency and customer success. Differentiate your firm by becoming an AWS Competency Partner.

Name: how to guides
Description: Learn Best Practices for Marketing Your Business with AWS. Guides are available to provide simple steps to extend the skills of your marketing team and help you showcase your products and services when marketing with AWS.

Name: partner central
Description: APN Partner Central (formerly known as the APN Portal) is the partner-only, section of the AWS site that provides all AWS Partner Network (APN) Partners (regardless of tier) with the tools and content they need to grow their business on AWS. Through APN Partner Central, APN Partners can access AWS technical and non-technical training, request marketing and business support, download partner-focused content, and connect with other AWS partners around the world.

Name: saas factory
Description: AWS SaaS Factory provides AWS Partner Network (APN) Partners with resources that help accelerate and guide their adoption of a SaaS delivery model. SaaS Factory includes reference architectures for building SaaS solutions on AWS; Quick Starts that automate deployments for key workloads on AWS; and exclusive training opportunities for building a SaaS business on AWS.

Name: saas program
Description: The AWS SaaS Partner Program provides APN Partners with support as they build, launch, and grow SaaS solutions on AWS. APN Technology Partners who develop SaaS solutions and utilize a SaaS-based software licensing and delivery model are encouraged to apply for the Program.

Name: aws marketplace
Description: The AWS Marketplace enables qualified partners to market and sell their software to AWS Customers. AWS Marketplace is an online software store that helps customers find, buy, and immediately start using the software and services that run on AWS.

Name: marketplace
Description: The AWS Marketplace enables qualified partners to market and sell their software to AWS Customers. AWS Marketplace is an online software store that helps customers find, buy, and immediately start using the software and services that run on AWS.

Name: direct connect program
Description: The AWS Direct Connect Program supports AWS Customers establish network connectivity between AWS Direct Connect locations and their datacenter, office, or colocation environment. Direct Connect Partners improve customer experience by providing flexibility and choices on how to connect with AWS.
